Header: 12 hour water cut to several areas including Wattala
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ The National Water Supply and Drainage Board said the supply of water to several areas including Peliyagoda will be suspended today (June 1), for a period of 12 hours from 7 p.m. onwards. Accordingly, water supply will be restricted in the divisional secretariat areas of Peliyagoda, Kelaniya, Wattala, Biyagama, Mahara, Dompe, Ja-Ela, Katunayake and Seeduwa. The Water Board also said the water supply will be suspended in certain areas of the Gampaha divisional secretariat. The water cut is due to a mandatory repair.
